ygData.subject: RE: About time
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll agree that for larger races it does suck (disadvantage of being large?), but maybe the timing of removing this item and getting Alchemy fixed wasn t just
ygData.messageBody:
I'll agree that for larger races it does suck (disadvantage of being
large?), but maybe the timing of removing this item and getting Alchemy
fixed wasn't just coincidental. I'll bet that they either have or will have
a Shrink spell in the game very soon. I'm not going to lie about it though
I'm extremely happy the change happened, and yes I think it should have
happened a lot sooner. I also think it may have been better if they would
have changed the effect to that of shrink (or Gnome, I've always wanted to
be a Gnome SK). Oh well, whats done is done.




-----Original Message-----
From: Steven E. Phipps [mailto:phipps@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 10:06 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] About time


From: "Steven E. Phipps" <phipps@...>

I think the change sucks, from the perspective of a large race. Many
dungeons are bugged, cant even walk into sola, get back down the stairs in
unrest, etc. This change hurts the large races bad, and came way too late,
atfer everyone and the brother done got it. Now large races are dependent on
shamans to enter the dungeons. Sucks to depend on 1 class. Maybe they will
throw out a shrink type item, course prob require getting a rare pop off a
dragon or something. I also feel like all the real cool items are gone.
Manastones, guise, jboots, etc. On the older servers so many people already
have these, and the ogrew that got there late will have to stand and shout
will pay for shrink at the dungeon entrance, while other people just click
on there mask. I am sure you smaller race shadowknights like the change
though.... Dont see why they waited 9 months to do it....

Morg
----- Original Message -----
From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 11:53 AM
Subject: [shadowknight] About time


> From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
> Non Dark Elfs probably won't like this as much, but it looks as though the
> Guise is no longer dropping. There is a new mask dropping that gives the
> same effect but must be worn to be used. As a Dark Elf I love this change,
> it's nice to get some of my identity back..
>
> http://everquest.gamestats.com/equipment/graphics9/Mask_of_Deception.html
>
> Enjoy folks...
>
> > -=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
> -= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
